title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: You may believe that you are absolutely right in a disagreement with a loved one, but making them wrong is only counterproductive. A struggle for dominance with a family member over a touchy subject can end quickly if you act with humility rather than self-righteousness today. The tough square between the egotistical Sun and controlling Pluto suggests that both of you might prefer to be right rather than kind. Resolving this dilemma starts by engaging in a civil conversation to build bridges. Emphasize your similarities instead of your differences. Love grows when hearts are open to change. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
